title: Login Issues with 2FA
description: A user who has lost their phone cannot log in because they cannot complete the two-factor authentication (2FA) step.

tasks.description: Go through a rigorous identity verification process with the user, using personal details and account history.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the user's identity with a high degree of certainty.

tasks.description: Once identity is confirmed, temporarily disable 2FA on the user's account.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully disables 2FA, allowing the user to log in.

tasks.description: Instruct the user to immediately set up 2FA again with their new device.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides clear instructions to re-secure the account.
